reviewText: Bob zoom is a masterpiece. Fun, catchy, great animation, and taught my daughter to sing words and eventually talk. Before bob zoom she had speech delay and with bob zoom she enjoyed the song, listened to them over and over , and now says fifty words !!
I like the content however, I never noticed it was only 24 mins long.  The price should have been lower for only one small segment.

Beautiful and excellent! The music, the songs, the animation (the style) and the theme are perfect. Best of all you get each and every song in three languages: Portuguese, Spanish and English. Your child will love this! Highly recommended.
